fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Entrap all your visitors at night, then kill them and wipe their will. 3 uses.
- Once you are out of entraps, use the players you have turned into furniture and attack a player. 1 use per player killed. If you killed less than 2 people, you get 2 uses instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Additionally, when you are entrapping, the abilities of your visitors will fail.
